attributes.action: abandon proposals to fund political parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the petitioners view that the current 3 "largest" political parties speak for fewer and fewer ordinary people, and are in thrall to spin, careerist politicians, and political corectness. They should be allowed to wither on the vine, so that, God willing, new parties emerge that speak for ordinary, decent, law abiding Britons.
